title: Cicada
lyrics:
In air so hot and sweet
We heard it in the breeze
Metallic shimmering 
Of invisible things
Will we ever have our own house?

Will we ever be in one place long?

Long enough to know all the sounds

To at least know our way around?



When you said that you'd love me better

With every passing day

How could that go on forever

When I'm different everyday



In air so hot and sweet 

We heard it in the breeze

Metallic simmering 

Of invisible things
